title: Enhancing Clinical Competency: VR-Based Flipped Learning CPR Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can perform CPR step-by-step procedures with 90% accuracy through VR simulation
Learners can effectively manage emergency situations by applying role allocation and communication protocols in team-based scenario training
Learners can complete self-directed practice assessments with at least 80% mastery using smartphone-based RQI (Resuscitation Quality Improvement) systems

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
